subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, considered to be Russia’s richest man, enjoyed success with the European powerhouse CSKA before an incident in 2007 that led to his losing control of the team.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, considered to be Russia’s richest man, enjoyed success with the European powerhouse CSKA before an incident in 2007 that led to his losing control of the team.
